description: Least k such that n = A009195(k) (= gcd(phi(k), k)).
comments: Coincides with A072995 for many terms, but differs, e.g., in n = 20, 40, 52, ... in addition to the zeros in A072995. See also the comments in A072994. - _M. F. Hasler_, Feb 23 2014a(n) <= n^2. - _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 27 2014
links: Robert G. Wilson v, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: t = Table[0, {10000}]; k = 1; While[k < 100000001, a = GCD[k, EulerPhi@ k]; If[a < 10001 && t[[a]] == 0, t[[a]] = k; Print[{a, k}]]; k++]; t (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 27 2014 *)
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Nov 15 1999
